item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Mezcal Restaurant
14 Mechanic St
New Haven, CT 06511

Who needs noisy, over-crowded Irish pubs where you fight drunk people to get served a green beer when you can have amazing margaritas, great food, and great company at Mezcal?!?

Mezcal is a new Mexican restaurant in New Haven offering authentic Mexican food as well as fantastic margaritas and Mexican beers. We had a very fun happy hour in December and it seems like the perfect time to go back.

The owner of Mezcal, Ricardo, is offering the same specials as last time:
** Â½ price well drinks
** $1.50 off top shelf alcohol including tequila
** chips and salsa (Ricardo put out a lot more than chips and salsa last time!)

The restaurant is open until 9:30 on Monday nights.

Contact is Andrea (203-641-8083)

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
